lab5.Moisture

Class MoistureController

  • java.lang.Object
    • lab5.Moisture.MoistureController

  • public class MoistureController
extends java.lang.Object

    Moisture Controller

    This controller deals with the moisture objects, such as the sprinkler, moisture sensor, and the environment
    It creates the temperature simulation threads
    When necessary it sends info the main controller to update the main view
    Since:
    2016-04-08
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Patrick Withams
